tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE surveys (
    survey_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    rating INT,
    feedback TEXT,
    survey_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  question_id INT,
  response_text TEXT,
  response_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    survey_date DATE NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    comments TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE CustomerSurvey (survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,survey_date DATE,survey_questions TEXT,customer_id INT);
CREATE TABLE SurveyResponse (response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,survey_id INT,response_date DATE,response_answers TEXT,customer_id INT);
CREATE TABLE Customer (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,customer_name TEXT,customer_email TEXT,customer_phone TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Product (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,product_name TEXT,product_category TEXT);
CREATE TABLE Service (service_id INT PRIMARY KEY,service_name TEXT,service_description TEXT);
